value.title: Learn Starcraft 2: EASY Beginner Zerg Build Order Guide [2021]
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2 Beginner's Guide (roach build order) . Let's learn a very easy beginner friendly zerg build order for Starcraft 2. This is a very powerful but also very easy build order (relatively at least haha) to execute for new players! Hope you learn a lot and enjoy the video!  Learn Starcraft 2: EASY
